Global Dataset on Higher Education Institutions
text: IAU WHED - World Higher Education Database, available https://whed.net/home.php

title: WHED Dataset — whed
text: dataset contains institution-level information higher education institutions around world.

title: WHED Dataset — whed
text: data frame 21165 rows 271 variables: name Name institution url Website URL institution country Country institution located id Unique identifier institution city City institution located name_detail Detailed name institution funding_type Type funding institution (e.g., public, private) languages Languages used institution accrediting_agency Accrediting agency institution year_founded Year institution founded academic_year Academic year details division_name_1 division_name_116 Names divisions (1 116) division_fields_study_1 division_fields_study_116 Fields study divisions (1 116) degree_name_1 degree_name_14 Names degrees (1 14) degree_fields_study_1 degree_fields_study_14 Fields study degrees (1 14)
